commit.message:
lto-cgraph.c (lto_output_node): Also stream the alias for regular aliases.

2009-12-15  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* lto-cgraph.c (lto_output_node): Also stream the alias
	for regular aliases.
	(input_node): Likewise.

From-SVN: r155249

+

+	for regular aliases.
+	(input_node): Likewise.
